api/Authgear.Xamarin.SessionStateChangeR.keywords: Enum SessionStateChangeReason The reason why SessionState is changed. These reasons can be thought of as the transition of a SessionState, which is described as follows: LOGOUT / INVALID / Clear +-----------------------------------------+ v | SessionState.UNKNOWN --- NO_TOKEN ----> SessionState.NO_SESSION ---- AUTHENTICATED -----> SessionState.AUTHENTICATED | ^ +------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ FOUND_TOKEN Namespace : Authgear.Xamarin Assembly : Authgear.Xamarin.dll Syntax public enum SessionStateChangeReason Fields Name Description Authenciated Clear FoundToken Invalid Logout NoToken
